question: Eric has 12 tubes of pink paint and 7 tubes of brown paint. Alex has three quarters as many tubes of pink paint as Eric, and two times as many tubes of brown paint as Eric. How many tubes of paint does Alex have?
answer:
Alex has 12*3/4= <<12*3/4=9>>9 tubes of pink paint
Alex has 7*2=<<7*2=14>>14 tubes of brown paint
Alex has a total of 9+14 =<<9+14=23>>23 tubes of paint
#### 23
